cis350.games

Class chessStandardBoard

  • java.lang.Object
    • cis350.games.chessBoard
      • cis350.games.chessStandardBoard

  • public class chessStandardBoard
extends chessBoard
    Subclass of a board. Standard version of a chess Board. Has methods for creating a standard chess board and populating it with regular chess pieces. Can be used to create a standard game of Chess.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class cis350.games.chessBoard
